title: The Hidden Risks of Custodial Wallets in Crypto Payments: How to Protect Your Funds with Smart Contracts
content:
As cryptocurrency becomes increasingly popular for businesses, the need for reliable and secure payment services has never been greater. However, many crypto payment providers rely on custodial wallets to store customer funds — a practice that comes with significant risks, including the possibility of your funds being blocked or frozen.

In this article, we’ll explore what custodial wallets are, the risks associated with them, real-world examples of funds being blocked, and how using smart contracts can eliminate these risks. We’ll also introduce JaneDoe finance, a unique payment system that leverages smart contracts to ensure the security and accessibility of your funds.
